name: slidescribe
description: An AI Assistant for Narration and Refinement of Powerpoint Slides

scripts.postinstall: cd addin && npm install && cd ../com-addin && npm install
scripts.start: npm run backend:up && npm run prep:bridge && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "ADDIN" -c "cyan" "npm run start:addin"
scripts.start:detached: npm run start:backend-detached && npm run start:addin
scripts.start:all: npm run build:com-addin && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "ADDIN,COM-WATCH,BACKEND" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm run start:addin" "npm run watch:com-addin" "npm run start:backend-attached"
scripts.start:addin: cd addin && echo Y| npm run start
scripts.backend:up: cd backend && docker compose up -d --force-recreate app chatterbox-tts
scripts.start:backend-detached: cd backend && docker compose up -d app chatterbox-tts
scripts.start:backend-attached: cd backend && docker compose up app chatterbox-tts
scripts.logs:backend: cd backend && docker compose logs -f app
